short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Count in one click all the time spent on events based on their color.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome app to calculate automatically in one click all the hours grouped by colors.

This app is based on the time boxing concept. The idea is that we are more productive if we box all of our events (personal or professional).

We can keep a trace of these events, remember what somebody has said in last week's meeting or count how many times we have worked out last month.

Download now to know exactly how you manage your time and how you could be more efficient with your time boxing.
